issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, the function symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared as extern, whereas in the template it is declared as global. This visibility mismatch will prevent the function from being properly exported and linked, causing confusion or link errors when students build and test their code.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the extern directive with a global declaration for fix_vec_sub_asm (i.e., change `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` to `global fix_vec_sub_asm`) so that the symbol is correctly exported.
